Articles.Content:
Hello I just wanted to play KSP but when I start the game it crashes instantly 

PC specs: 

CPU: Intel Core i7 8550U (*th gen)

RAM: 16 GB

GPU: Intel UHD graphics 620

Here's my buildID64

[config]
build id = 03173
2021.11.02 at 15:19:28 PDT
Branch: master
language = en-us
distribution name = Steam
My KSP.log

[LOG 14:39:56.987] ******* Log Initiated for Kerbal Space Program - 1.12.3.3173 (WindowsPlayer x64) en-us *******
Kerbal Space Program - 1.12.3.3173 (WindowsPlayer x64) en-us


OS: Windows 10  (10.0.0) 64bit
CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8550U CPU @ 1.80GHz (8)
RAM: 16281
GPU: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 620 (8140MB)
SM: 50 (Direct3D 11.0 [level 11.1])
RT Formats: ARGB32, Depth, ARGBHalf, Shadowmap, RGB565, ARGB4444, ARGB1555, Default, ARGB2101010, DefaultHDR, ARGB64, ARGBFloat, RGFloat, RGHalf, RFloat, RHalf, R8, ARGBInt, RGInt, RInt, BGRA32, RGB111110Float, RG32, RGBAUShort, RG16, BGRA10101010_XR, BGR101010_XR, R16


Log started: Thu, Aug 11, 2022 14:39:57

And Player.log https://drive.google.com/file/d/1my3JDc4gnAS4R0d-kgGsvHPRSKbMzgyY/view?usp=sharing

Please help thank you

Greetings

"D3D11: Failed to create RenderTexture (1280 x 720 fmt 19 aa 1), error 0x887a0005 (Filename: Line: 207)"

Is somewhat telling, the game simply fails to create a canvas/window-thingy.

1. have you tried without the -forceopengl flag?

2. updated gpu driver? (dxdiag should give a clue).
I've got the latest drivers and I tried without -forceopengl but nothing works

19 minutes ago, Lofis said:

I've got the latest drivers and I tried without -forceopengl but nothing works

Snooped around and it appears to be unity wide and driver related.

Can you try to rename your settings.cfg to something like not_settings.cfg to force the game back to windowed and default resolution?

Or we can hope that someone smarter than me has a solution.
Thank you so much the game is now working, I have one more question how can I enable other launchsites on sandbox mode I can't find it now  but I remember this function was in older versions

1 minute ago, Lofis said:

Thank you so much the game is now working, I have one more question how can I enable other launchsites on sandbox mode I can't find it now  but I remember this function was in older versions

No idea really.
But did you upgrade Making History when you updated the main game?
